0.01.name: wordpress/retro
0.01.description: A colorful and vintage WordPress theme. It supports custom navigation menus, 4 widget areas, featured images and no-sidebar/full-width page template. A smart and clean two column theme with great features: Custom Logo, Recent Posts Widget, 125x125 Banner Widget, SocialMedia Buttons Widget, Facebook Widget, Twitter Widget, Dropdown Navigation, Theme Option Panel and more.
